synopsis.text:
Japan-exclusive video game inspires the anime series "Shachibato! President, It's Time for Battle!", where Minato assumes the role of the new president of the Kibou Company. In the thriving city of Gatepia, access to Kirakuri - a vital energy source for humanity - is obtained through colossal gates leading to dungeons filled with this precious crystal. To ensure the growth and success of his company, Minato must assemble a formidable team of adventurers to gather Kirakuri.

Competing against numerous other corporations vying for the same resource, Minato embarks on his presidential journey alongside his childhood friend Yutoria, a priest named Makoto, a soldier named Akari, and an accountant named Guide. Together, they strive to complete various missions and uncover the truth behind Minato's father's mysterious disappearance within one of Gatepia's largest gates.

Join Minato and his team as they navigate the challenges of running a treasure-hunting company while battling monsters and rival corporations in their quest to become the greatest fantasy adventuring company in Gatepia!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
